definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: separation, concr. part (bid=-un, bid=ah;un portion)—sf. (always with [[לְ]]) [[לְבַדִּי]], [[לְבַדּוֹ]] etc., 3 f. pl. † Ge 21:28 [[לְבַדְּהֶן]], v:Ge 21:29 [[לְבַדָּ֫נׇה]];—
with [[לְ]], only in sg., [[לְבַד]] prop. in a state of (v. sub [[לְ]]) separation, alone, by itself (Fr. à part).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ex 26:9 (= Ex 36:16) five curtains [[לְבַד]] by themselves, and six curtains [[לְבַד]] by themselves, Ju Jdg 7:5 him shalt thou set [[לבד]] apart, Zec 12:12–14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with sf. (89 t.) to express the idea of by oneself, alone (prop. in his, thy, my separation), Ge 2:18 it is not good for man to be [[לְבַדּוֹ]] alone, Ge 21:28 and A. set the seven lambs [[לְבַדְּהֶן]] by themselves (lit. in their separation), Ge 32:17, Ge 43:32, 2Sa 10:8, Is 5:8; Ge 42:38 [[הוּא לְבַדּוֹ]] he alone, Ex 18:14 [[אַתָּה לְבַדְּךָ]] thou alone, Nu 11:14 [[אָנׁכִי לְבַדִּי]] I alone, 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14; De 8:3 not upon bread alone, De 29:13, 2Sa 13:32, 2Sa 18:24, Is 44:24, Is 49:21, Is 63:3 +; after an oblique case, as a dat. Ex 22:19, Ju Jdg 3:20, Ps 51:6 [[לְךָ לְבַדְּךָ]] against thee alone have I sinned; a genit. Ps 71:16 I will make mention of :[[חִדְקָֽתְךָ לְבַדֶּֽךָ]] the righteousness of thee alone.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as adv. of limitation, † Is 26:13 only through thee do we celebrate thy name, Ec 7:29.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: followed by [[מִן]] it becomes a prep., apart from, besides, Ex 12:37, Nu 29:39, De 3:5, De 18:8 (rd. [[מִמְּכָרָיו]] with LXX SyrVer Targum Aq Ew Di) Ju Jdg 8:26, Jdg 20:15 al. (15 t.); once, Ezr 1:6, with [[עַל]] instead of [[מִן]].

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[מִלְּבַד]]:33 (prob. inverted for [[לְבַד מִן]] besides) (chiefly P and late): Ge 26:1, Ge 46:26, Le 9:17, Le 23:38 (4 t.) Nu 5:8, Nu 6:21, Nu 16:49 + 12 t. Nu 28–29; De 28:69, Jos 22:29, 1Ki 10:13, 1Ch 3:9, 2Ch 9:12, 2Ch 17:19, 2Ch 31:16, Ezr 2:65 = Ne 7:67, Da 11:4. With sf. † De 4:35 [[אֵין עוֹד מִלְּבַדּוֹ]] there is none else besides him (cf. [[מִבַּלְעָדַי]] Is 45:21).
concr. part Ex 30:34 (P) [[בַּד בְּבַד יִהְיֶה]] part for (i.e. like; cf. [[בְּ]]

[[בַּדִּים]] parts, spec. extended from something, i.e. (a) of a body, members, limbs Job 18:13 (of man), Job 41:4 (of crocodile); (b) of a vine, rods or shoots Ez Eze 17:6, Eze 19:14; (c) of poles or staves used for carrying the ark Ex 25:13, Ex 25:14, Ex 25:15, Ex 35:12, Ex 37:4, Ex 37:5, Ex 39:35, Ex 40:20, Nu 4:6, 1Ki 8:7, 1Ki 8:8, 1Ki 8:8 (= 2Ch 5:8, 2Ch 5:9, 2Ch 5:9), or table of shewbread Ex 25:27, Ex 25:28, Ex 35:13, Ex 37:14, Ex 37:15, Nu 4:8, or altar of B. O. Ex 27:6, Ex 27:6, Ex 27:7, Ex 27:7, Ex 35:16, Ex 38:5, Ex 38:6, Ex 38:7, Ex 39:39, Nu 4:14, or altar of incense Ex 30:4, Ex 30:5, Ex 35:15, Ex 37:27, Ex 37:28, Nu 4:11; (d) more gen. bars (of fortress) Ho 11:6, (of a gate) Job 17:16 fig. [[בַּדֵּי שְׁאׂל]] (v. Is 38:10).
